description.value:
Activate A (manipulate)

Your features transform into something bestial and lumbering.

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks and unarmed attack rolls. You gain a claw unarmed attack (4d8 slashing damage) with the agile trait and a jaws unarmed attack (4d10 piercing damage). @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Striking] runes don't modify the damage caused by these attacks. You gain the weapon specialization with the claws and jaws, or greater weapon specialization, if you already have weapon specialization with these unarmed attacks.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves, Acrobatics checks, and Stealth Checks.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Major)]
